name: Ombres G Quad Eyeshadow Palette- Limited Edition
about: What it is:An eyeshadow palette featuring a unique harmony of red, pink, and copper tones to blend together for a precious, festive look..Highlighted Ingredients:- Winter Rose Oil: Allows the formula to be soft and comfortable..Ingredient Callouts:This palette is cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:For the festive season, Violette, GUERLAIN’s Makeup Creative Director, has been inspired by artist Shourouk Rhaiem’s rhinestone world to create the limited-edition Ombres G 888 Regarde-moi. To celebrate this exclusive collaboration, Shourouk Rhaiem has made the Ombres G jewel case shine brightly, covering it in rhinestones with holographic reflections. She has designed a rhinestone eye made up in the colors of the collection to attract every gaze..This Palette Contains:
ingredients: -Winter Rose Oil: Allows the formula to be soft and comfortable...#20464:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Silica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Zinc Stearate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauroyl Lysine, Chlorphenesin, Maltodextrin, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 75470 (Carmine), Ci 77491, Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines)]...#20462:.Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Pentylene Glycol, Maltodextrin, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Lauroyl Lysine, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Sorbic Acid, Tocopherol, [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 75470 (Carmine), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)]...#20465:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Silica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Maltodextrin, Zinc Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauroyl Lysine, Chlorphenesin, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, [+/- Ci 75470 (Carmine), Ci 77491, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)]...#20463:.Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Lauroyl Lysine, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.To recreate the festive look by Violette: .-Apply the copper eyeshadow to illuminate the eyelid..-Line the eye with the matte pink eyeshadow..-Add the red eyeshadow for a more intense effect..-Sculpt lashes with Noir G 01 Black mascara (sold separately).

shades.shade_descriptor: quad in pink and copper tones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Technique required to create daytime/workplace looks by combining it with other palettes. Using red+pink as blush with fluffy brush and very light hand (lasts all day).
